title: I've black screen with the new client !!!
body:
after the last update when i click launch a new black screen appears with the sound in background , pls how can i fix this ?
I'm using WIN 10

replies.body:
This commonly happens if there are issues during your upgrade. The steps below should help you bypass this error:

>1. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
2. Open user.cfg with notepad
3. Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
4. Save and launch LoL again

Let me know if this worked for you!

thank you very much finally I'm able to play again with the old client
but is there any way to fix the new one ?

There very well may be! Black screens in the client have historically been related to a poor connection to the servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if it makes the Beta Client usable for you.

Let me know the results!

I still got this problem now when the old client was deactivated (at least in EUW)
